purpose: To provide a flexible and powerful SDK for creating AI agents capable of executing code with enhanced observability and state management.
principle: The execution engine is built on an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) model, allowing for dynamic code execution and manipulation while maintaining the integrity of workflows.
reusability: The SDK is designed to be modular, enabling developers to reuse components across different projects and workflows.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply incomplete features and potential instability in certain functionalities.
name: agentscript
description: CodeAct Agent SDK with an AST-based code execution engine, enabling stop/start workflows, tool-level state management, and enhanced observability.
highlight: AST-based code execution engine for dynamic code manipulation and enhanced observability.
